welcome.name: Welcome
welcome.content:
Welcome to mineflayer-autocrystal üëã

> mineflayer-autocrystal is a plugin that lets mineflayer bots automatically place and destroy end crystals. ### üè† [Homepage](https://github.com/LINKdiscordd/mineflayer-autocrystal) [![Autocrystal CI](https://github.com/link-discord/mineflayer-autocrystal/actions/workflows/ci.yml/badge.svg)](https://github.com/link-discord/mineflayer-autocrystal/actions/workflows/ci.yml) ## Install ```sh npm install mineflayer-autocrystal ``` ## Example ```js const mineflayer = require('mineflayer') const { autoCrystal } = require('../lib/index') function main() { const bot = mineflayer.createBot({ host: 'localhost', username: 'AutoCrystal', }) bot.loadPlugin(autoCrystal) bot.once('spawn', () => { bot.autoCrystal.options.logErrors = true console.clear() console.log('Spawned.') bot.chat('/gamemode creative') bot.chat('/give @s end_crystal 500') }) bot.on('end', () => { main() }) bot.on('kicked', (reason) => { console.log(reason) main() }) bot.on('error', (reason) => { console.error(reason) main() }) bot.on('chat', async (username, message) => { if (username === bot.username) return switch (message) { case 'start': bot.chat('AutoCrystal enabled.') await bot.autoCrystal.enable() break case 'stop': bot.chat('AutoCrystal disabled.') await bot.autoCrystal.disable() break case 'holes': const holes = await bot.autoCrystal.getHoles() bot.chat(`Found ${holes.length} holes made out of bedrock.`) break default: break } }) } main() ``` ## Author üë§ **Link#0069** * Github: [@LINKdiscordd](https://github.com/LINKdiscordd) ## ü§ù Contributing Contributions, issues and feature requests are welcome!
Feel free to check [issues page](https://github.com/LINKdiscordd/mineflayer-autocrystal/issues). ## Show your support Give a ‚≠êÔ∏è if this project helped you! ## üìù License Copyright ¬© 2021 [Link#0069](https://github.com/LINKdiscordd).
This project is [GNU GPLv3](https://github.com/LINKdiscordd/mineflayer-autocrystal/blob/master/LICENSE) licensed. *** _This README was generated with ‚ù§Ô∏è by [readme-md-generator](https://github.com/kefranabg/readme-md-generator)_

methods.name: findPosition
methods.description: Finds the best position to place the crystal on to.

returns.description: The position to place the crystal on.

methods.name: placeCrystal
methods.description: Places the crystal on the specified position.

returns.description: A boolean indicating if the crystal was placed.
A boolean indicating if the crystal was broken.

props.name: ignoreInventoryCheck
props.description: If the inventory check should be ignored.

props.name: damageThreshold
props.description: If the damage exceeds the threshold, it will not place / break the crystal.

props.name: delay
props.description: The delay in ticks between each crystal placement.

props.name: placeMode
props.description: The mode used to place the crystal. Can be "suicide", "safe" or "damage".The "damage" place mode will place the crystal on the block where the damage for the bot is the lowestand the damage for the opponent is the highest.

props.name: breakMode
props.description: The mode used to break the crystal.
